name: wc
description: Count lines, words, and characters in text. Reads from standard input and prints the count of newlines, words, and bytes. Use -l for line count only, -w for word count only, -c for byte count only, or -m for character count. Without flags, prints all three counts. Use for measuring text length, counting entries in a list, or checking file sizes.

input.description: Text to count, provided on standard input.

output.description: Counts of lines, words, and characters (or whichever subset was requested via flags).
